text: "Childhood" is a song composed by American singer Michael Jackson, released in 1995 as part of his ninth studio album HIStory: Past, Present and Future, Book I (1995) and was released as a double A-side with Jackson's single "Scream". The song, which serves as the official soundtrack theme of the 1995 movie Free Willy 2, reflects themes of nostalgia, lost innocence, and the challenges of growing up in the public eye. Jackson often addressed his feelings of isolation and the longing for a normal childhood in his music, and "Childhood" is a poignant example of this. The song features a gentle melody and introspective lyrics, showcasing Jackson's signature vocal style. It also includes a striking orchestral arrangement and is accompanied by a notable music video that emphasizes its themes. Category:1995 songs Category:Michael Jackson songs
title: Childhood (Michael Jackson song)
